languages.text: {n}Вы слышите, как в пустых отсеках нарастает лязгающее эхо — словно сотни когтистых лап ударяют по переборкам и вцепляются в перекладины. Кто бы ни надвигался на вас, их много. Пока вас не зажали в этой тесной вокс-рубке, надо спасаться.{/n}

{n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed limbs striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы слышите, как в пустых отсеках нарастает лязгающее эхо — словно сотни когтистых лап ударяют по переборкам и вцепляются в перекладины. Кто бы ни надвигался на вас, их много. Пока вас не зажали в этой тесной вокс-рубке, надо спасаться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed paws thumping at bulkheads and grabbing on to bars. Whoever it is that's advancing upon you, there's a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox room.{/n}

{n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed paws thumping at bulkheads and grabbing on to bars. Whoever it is that's advancing upon you, there's a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox room.{/n}

{n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}

{n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}

{n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oyes un estruendo metálico que proviene de los módulos vacíos: es como si cientos de garras golpearan las mamparas y agarraran diversas barras. Sea lo que sea que se acerca, hay muchos. Será mejor que corras por tu vida antes de que te atrapen en esta cabina de voco tan estrecha.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed limbs striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes un estruendo metálico que proviene de los módulos vacíos: es como si cientos de garras golpearan las mamparas y agarraran diversas barras. Sea lo que sea que se acerca, hay muchos. Será mejor que corras por tu vida antes de que te atrapen en esta cabina de voco tan estrecha.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听到空荡荡的舱室里，“铛铛铛”的声音变得越来越响，仿佛几百只爪子在敲打着舱壁，抓着栏杆。虽然不知道是谁在朝这边冲过来，但它们为数众多。你最好赶紧逃命，否则就要被这群家伙困在这个狭小的音阵室里了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed limbs striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到空荡荡的舱室里，“铛铛铛”的声音变得越来越响，仿佛几百只爪子在敲打着舱壁，抓着栏杆。虽然不知道是谁在朝这边过来，但它们为数众多。你应该赶紧逃命，否则就要被这群家伙困在这个狭小的音阵室里了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}空のモジュールの中で、キンキンというエコー音が大きくなる。何百もの爪のある手足が仕切りを引っ掻いて、柵を掴んでいるようだ。こちらに近づくものの正体は分からないが、たくさんいることは確か。この狭いヴォクス・キャビンに閉じ込められる前に、命がけで逃げなければ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed limbs striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}空のモジュールの中で、キンキンというエコー音が大きくなる。何百もの爪のある手足が仕切りを引っ掻いて、柵を掴んでいるようだ。こちらに近づくものの正体は分からないが、たくさんいることは確か。この狭いヴォクス・キャビンに閉じ込められる前に、命がけで逃げなければ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hörst ein dröhnendes Echo aus den leeren Modulen, das immer lauter wird. Als würden Hunderte von krallenbewehrten Gliedern gegen Schotten schlagen und an Metallstangen reißen. Wer immer sich dir nähert, es sind viele. Du solltest um dein Leben rennen, bevor sie dich in dieser engen Vox-Kabine einsperren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed limbs striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst ein dröhnendes Echo aus den leeren Modulen, das immer lauter wird. Als würden Hunderte von Klauen gegen Schotten schlagen und an Metallstangen reißen. Wer immer sich dir nähert, es sind viele. Du solltest um dein Leben rennen, bevor sie dich in dieser engen Vox-Kabine einsperren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez des bruits métalliques résonner de plus en plus fort dans les modules vides, comme si des centaines de griffes frappaient les cloisons et s'accrochaient à des barreaux. Vous ignorez qui s'approche de vous, mais ils sont nombreux. Mieux vaut prendre la fuite avant qu'ils ne vous piègent dans cette cabine-vox exiguë.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed limbs striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez des bruits métalliques résonner de plus en plus fort dans les modules vides, comme si des centaines de griffes frappaient les cloisons et s'accrochaient à des barreaux. Vous ignorez qui s'approche de vous, mais ils sont nombreux. Mieux vaut prendre la fuite avant qu'ils ne vous piègent dans cette cabine-vox exiguë.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Boş modüllerde çınlayan yankının sesi gitgide artıyor. Sanki yüzlerce pençeli uzuv, bölme panellerine saldırıp parmaklıkları tırmalıyor. Yaklaşanlar her kimse sayıca üstün oldukları belli. Bu sıkış tepiş voks kabininde kapana kısılmadan önce kaçıp canını kurtarmalısın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a clanging echo growing louder in the empty modules: like hundreds of clawed limbs striking bulkheads and grabbing onto bars. Whoever is advancing upon you, there are a lot of them. You ought to run for your life before they trap you in this crammed vox-cabin.{/n}
